Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ControllerInterface
    Interface for Controller class that can be used to prevent usage of methods that are not handle***().
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeDiceValueControllerState  
    ChooseFromTrackControllerState  
    Controller
    Class that represent the Controller according the MVC paradigm.
    ControllerState
    Abstract class that represents a generic state of the Controller.
    ControllerStateManager
    Manages the creation of Controller's States
    DiceBag
    Contains all the dices that can be drafted and used.
    DraftControllerState  
    MoveControllerState  
    ObjectiveCardFactory
    Creates all the types of Objective Cards: PublicObjectiveCard and PrivateObjectiveCard.
    ObjectiveCardManager
    Manages the creation and distribution of Objective Cards, ensuring that the same card can't be created more than once
    PlaceControllerState  
    RerollDraftedControllerState  
    RerollDraftPoolControllerState  
    RollOverDraftedControllerState  
    Scorer
    Calculates and retrieves the rankings of a given list of players and public objective cards.
    StartControllerState  
    SwapDraftedWithTrackControllerState  
    SwitchDraftedWithBagControllerState  
    ToolCardControllerState  
    ToolCardsManager
    Manages creation and distribution of Tool Cards
    WindowPatternManager
    Manages the loading and creation of WindowPattern
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AcceptingPlayerException
    The class AcceptingPlayerException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that something in the player accepting process (by default done by Controller) has failed.
    BadFormattedPatternFileException
    The class BadFormattedPatternFileException is a form of Exception that is used to notify that an .xml file representing a pattern is bad formatted and due to this can't be correctly processed.
    BadFormattedToolCardFileException
    The class BadFormattedToolCardFileException is a form of Exception that is used to notify that an .xml file representing a toolcard is bad formatted and due to this can't be correctly processed.
    NoMoreRoundsAvailableException
    The class NoMoreRoundsAvailableException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no more rounds are available.
    NoMoreTurnsAvailableException
    The class NoMoreTurnsAvailableException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no more turns are available.
    NoPatternsFoundInFileSystemException
    The class NoPatternsFoundInFileSystemException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no patterns files were found in the file system inspection.
    NoToolCardsFoundInFileSystemException
    The class NoToolCardsFoundInFileSystemException is a form of Exception that is used to notify the application that no toolcards files were found in the file system inspection.
